Direct-To | May 2017

Advisory Vertical Guidance with No Published Vertical Descent Angle
Operators of aircraft equipped with Honeywell Flight Management Systems affected by the "Advisory Vertical Guidance" issue should read this important update... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/May2017/SAIBMay17]]>
NZ FMS 6.1 <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/May2017/FMS61May17]]> May Highlights - Temperature Compensation / Circling Approaches
Learn about Temperature Compensation and Circling Approaches in this month's edition of FMS 6.1 Highlights... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/May2017/FMS61May17]]> VHF Datalink Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/May2017/SITAMay17]]> SITA North American Frequency Change
A change is coming that will impact VHF datalink systems in North America... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/May2017/SITAMay17]]>
Engine Insights <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/May2017/EITFE731May17]]> TFE731 Ignition Use
Continuous Ignition means the ignition system has no defined maximum duty cycle; therefore, it may be operated.... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/May2017/EITFE731May17]]>

Honeywell’s Global Customer Committee Looking for Pilots
Due to the growth and impact the GCC has had, the committee is looking to expand the pilot membership base... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/May2017/GCCMay17]]>
